Package com.incadencecorp.coalesce.common.helpers

Contains utility classes used by Coalesce.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayHelper
    Factory class for manipulating arrays.
    CoalesceIterator Deprecated 
    CoalesceTableHelper
    This is a utility class for mapping Coalesce objects to database tables.
    DateTimeConverter
    Performs the translation between date times as strings stored in the format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZZ and DateTime.
    DocumentProperties
    Provides access to the properties of a file.
    DocumentThumbnailHelper
    Provides helper methods for creating thumbnail images for files.
    DocumentThumbnailHelper.DocumentThumbnailResults
    Contains the bytes and original dimensions of a thumbnail image.
    EntityLinkHelper
    Provides helper methods for linking two CoalesceEntity objects together.
    FileHelper
    Provides helper methods for accessing and interacting with files.
    GraphicsHelper
    Provides helper methods for resampling images and generating thumbnails.
    GUIDHelper
    Provides helper methods for working with GUIDs.
    JodaDateTimeHelper
    Provides helper methods for converting between String values and DateTime objects.
    LocaleConverter
    Performs the translation between languages as strings stored in the format defined in "RFC 3066, Tags for the Identification of Languages" and Locale.
    MimeHelper
    Provides helper methods for obtaining MIME type information.
    SecurityHelper  
    StringHelper
    Provides helper methods for manipulating and testing String values.
    XmlHelper
    Provides helper methods for serializing and deserializing objects to XML.

Package com.incadencecorp.coalesce.common.helpers Description

Contains utility classes used by Coalesce.
